channel.title: Run.bat help
channel.description:
So i finished editing my server, and now all of a sudden when i open run.bat it immediately closes. Any help. Here is the current code when editing run.bat [code]@echo off Title Intense-PvP C:\Prgram Files\Java\jre6\bin\java.exe Echo Please wait while the client loads. This may take a while. exit[/code]
I'm kind of a new coder, so this is a big problem to me haha. and yes i have jre

item.title: Run.bat help
item.dc:creator: @we_rushed_god we rushed god
item.description:
@we_rushed_god wrote:

[quote=“skillingman8, post:2, topic:409362”]It closes because of this.

“exit” at the end of you’re .bat.

Change “exit” to “pause” and if it says,

press anykey to continue, or something like that. Give me the error that is showing up before all that happens.[/quote]
ok check back here regularly please :3

Edit: ok here is the new error message it says, but i know i have jre6 i just checked, and it says

The system cannot find the patch specified. Please wait while the client loads (i have it say this when opening client) Press any key to continue

Read full topic

item.title: Run.bat help
item.dc:creator: @we_rushed_god we rushed god
item.description:
@we_rushed_god wrote:

So i finished editing my server, and now all of a sudden when i open run.bat it immediately closes. Any help.
Here is the current code when editing run.bat

@echo off Title Intense-PvP C:\Prgram Files\Java\jre6\bin\java.exe Echo Please wait while the client loads. This may take a while. exit

I’m kind of a new coder, so this is a big problem to me haha. and yes i have jre
